content.text:
# Morningside Ward

| area =
| class = Inner metropolitan
}}
The Morningside Ward is a Brisbane City Council ward covering Morningside, Balmoral, Bulimba, Hawthorne, Norman Park, Seven Hills, and parts of Camp Hill and Cannon Hill.
